name: CityofTamaracFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Follow the latest news and events, and receive emergency alerts, all from the City of Tamarac, Florida, within Alexa’s Flash Briefing.

Add the City of Tamarac to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account.

After adding the City of Tamarac, you can say “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
